attributes.additional_details: It seems that it is possible to sign any e-petition any number of times (you just need more than one email account). It is therefore possible that the debate being held in the House Of Commons tonight (24-10-2011) may not have been signed by over 100,000 individuals. This service should be suspended and consideration be given to postponing all existing e-Petitions until this basic IT fault is eradicated.
